Trade/Device Name(s): MassCheck Immunosuppressants Whole Blood Controls (Level I-IV, Blank)
MassCheck Immunosuppressant Whole Blood Controls (Level I-IV plus Blank)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Chromsystems MassCheck Immunosuppressants Whole Blood Controls, a lyophilized multi-analyte human whole blood control for immunosuppressant assay verification.
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic device intended to verify performance of laboratory assay systems measuring cyclosporine, tacrolimus, or sirolimus.
